tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE legal_cases (
  case_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  case_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  case_type VARCHAR(50),
  plaintiff_name VARCHAR(100),
  defendant_name VARCHAR(100),
  case_status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'Pending',
  resolution_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE legal_cases (
  case_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  case_name VARCHAR(255),
  case_status VARCHAR(50),
  case_type VARCHAR(50),
  case_initiation_date DATE,
  case_resolution_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE case_parties (
  party_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  party_name VARCHAR(255),
  party_role VARCHAR(50),
  party_contact VARCHAR(100),
  case_id UUID REFERENCES legal_cases(case_id)
)

CREATE TABLE cases (
 case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 case_name VARCHAR(255),
 case_type VARCHAR(50),
 case_status VARCHAR(50),
 case_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE case_parties (
 party_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 party_name VARCHAR(255),
 party_role VARCHAR(50),
 party_contact VARCHAR(50),
 case_id INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES cases(case_id)
)

CREATE TABLE case_updates (
 update_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 update_date DATE,
 update_description TEXT,
 case_id INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES cases(case_id)
)

CREATE TABLE case (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 case_number VARCHAR(50),
 case_status VARCHAR(20),
 case_type VARCHAR(50),
 date_initiated DATE,
 date_resolved DATE
)

CREATE TABLE parties (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 case_id INT,
 party_name VARCHAR(50),
 party_type VARCHAR(20),
 party_role VARCHAR(50),
 FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES case(id)
)

CREATE TABLE documents (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 case_id INT,
 document_name VARCHAR(100),
 document_type VARCHAR(50),
 date_created DATE,
 FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES case(id)
)

CREATE TABLE hearings (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 case_id INT,
 hearing_date DATE,
 location VARCHAR(100),
 presiding_judge VARCHAR(50),
 FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES case(id)
)
CREATE TABLE CaseDetails (case_id INT PRIMARY KEY, case_name VARCHAR(255), case_status VARCHAR(50), case_description TEXT, case_initiation_date TIMESTAMP, case_resolution_date TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE CaseParties (party_id INT PRIMARY KEY, case_id INT, party_name VARCHAR(255), party_type VARCHAR(50), party_role VARCHAR(50), FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES CaseDetails(case_id));
CREATE TABLE CaseDocuments (doc_id INT PRIMARY KEY, case_id INT, doc_name VARCHAR(255), doc_type VARCHAR(50), doc_content BYTEA, FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES CaseDetails(case_id));
CREATE TABLE CaseNotes (note_id INT PRIMARY KEY, case_id INT, note_date TIMESTAMP, note_content TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES CaseDetails(case_id));
CREATE TABLE CaseStatusHistory (status_id INT PRIMARY KEY, case_id INT, status_date TIMESTAMP, status VARCHAR(50), status_description TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES CaseDetails(case_id));
